name: Salt marsh - Vegetated intertidal flats e.g. grasses, herbs, low shrubs - ecosystem component from the WIO Symphony tool
description: This layer were created using the avarage NDVI value over MODIS sattellite data from 01/01/2020-31/12/2020. A yearly average of NDVI values then were extracted within the intertidal areas. The mangrove layer was also used to remove mangrove pixels out from this raster layer. Known limitations: Metadata missing
